title: Net Tools 4.5.74
description:
The main idea behind project Net Tools is to create and provide one immense tool with all the main network tools included in it. A lot of sniffing and scanning network tools are present, but also other multipurpose tools (file tools, system tools, ...) that could be used by system administrators. In this way certain procedures could be done easier and faster by various network users. There are quite a lot of constructive and valuable applications included in Net Tools. With his 150+ tools it is a great variety of useful tools for network users. Here is a list of the most important tools:

1) IP Address Scanner 
2) IP Calculator
3) IP Converter
4) Port Listener
5) Port Scanner
6) Ping 
7) NetStat (2 ways)
8) Trace Route (2 ways)
9) TCP/IP Configuration
10) Online - Offline Checker
11) Resolve Host & IP
12) Time Sync
13) Whois & MX Lookup
14) Connect0r
15) Connection Analysator and protector
16) Net Sender
17) E-mail seeker
18) Net Pager
19) Active and Passive port scanner
